pages.text: Sieving Dust and using the Netherite Mesh will output:$(br)-Bone Meal: 0.15, 0.075$(br)-Certus Quartz Dust: 0.1, 0.05$(br)-Fluix Dust: 0.1, 0.05$(br)-Redstone Dust: 0.1, 0.05$(br)-Sky Stone Dust: 0.08, 0.04$(br)-Glowstone Dust: 0.075, 0.0375$(br)-Gunpowder: 0.05, 0.025$(br)-Inferium Essence: 0.05, 0.025$(br)-Yellorium Dust: 0.05, 90.025$(br)-Flux dust: 0.02, 0.01$(br)-Platinum Dust: 0.012, 0.006$(br)-Bismuth Dust: 0.01, 0.005
